MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Broad Lane ,Troutbeck Grove, Dalston Drive, Rothwaite Grove and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is an underground cable fault affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 2 PM via Generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57 PM on 13th November 2020..
